title: Next.js Conference
description: Join industry experts at the Next.js Conference to explore the future of web development, discover new features, best practices, and network with fellow developers. Workshops and keynote sessions included.

title: React Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop designed for both beginners and experienced developers. Learn how to build scalable React applications, state management, hooks, and performance optimization in real-world projects.

title: Startup Pitch Night
description: Local startups present their innovative ideas to a panel of investors and mentors. Network with entrepreneurs, get feedback, and gain inspiration for your own startup journey.

title: AI & Machine Learning Summit
description: Explore the latest trends and breakthroughs in AI and ML. Attend insightful talks, panel discussions, and hands-on demos showcasing applications in healthcare, finance, and more.

title: Women in Tech Meetup
description: An empowering meetup for women in technology to share experiences, learn from industry leaders, and foster mentorship and networking opportunities in a supportive environment.

title: Cloud Computing Bootcamp
description: A comprehensive 2-day bootcamp covering AWS, Azure, and GCP. Learn cloud architecture, deployment, CI/CD pipelines, and best practices to accelerate your career in cloud computing.

title: UI/UX Design Conference
description: Join designers and UX researchers to explore modern UI/UX practices. Sessions include design systems, accessibility, user research, prototyping, and case studies from top tech companies.

title: Tech Career Fair
description: Meet top companies, recruiters, and startups at the Tech Career Fair. Learn about open positions, internships, and career development opportunities in the technology industry.
